channel.title: [718] Item Option > Dialogue failure
channel.description:
Hello everyone, i hope i can get helped there :)
I have created an Item Upgrading system like in TizenX, the system works like this, When you right click the item and select "Upgrade" the item get upgraded and requires tokens, i have tried to add a Warning before Upgrading and its requires Dialogue but when the Dialogue opens i click continue in the dialogue and its get stuck.
[CODE] else if (itemId == 13742) player.getDialogueManager().startDialogue("UpgEly");[/CODE]
Here is video showing the issue. AGAIN: I'm using the same Dialogue file on the 2 methods just to show you the Dialogue works. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IDIYSPi3kBk
Thank you.

I’m facing another issue, anyway we can have a live chat for direct assist?[/quote]
There’s no live chat on the forums. (closest is IRC)
My skype is on my profile.

Read full topic

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote="[Owner"]Tyler link=topic=674796.msg4509482#msg4509482 date=1465407470]

Provide more than 2 lines of code. We need to see basically all the code related to your issue.

I have FIXED the problem by myself.

Thank you.[/quote]
Glad to hear it. Sorry we can’t be more help when you don’t provide enough code.
